name: Easy and Fast Cajun Chicken Caesar Salad
author: Melissa Bellemare
summary: This is an easy supper for one or more, I'll tell you this one isn't a bore. Could be used as an entree or a main dish, for lunch or for supper whatever you wish.
ingredients: 4  skinless, boneless chicken breast halves - cut into strips
1 head romaine lettuce- rinsed, dried and chopped
directions: Place bacon in a large, deep skillet
Cook over medium high heat until evenly brown
In a preheated skillet, add the chicken, seasoning mix and oil
Cook until chicken is golden brown
Remove from heat and set aside
In a salad bowl, combine Romaine, enough salad dressing to coat, Parmesan cheese and bacon
Toss and place on individual salad plates
Top with the sliced chicken and serve
